methods.name: focus
methods.description: Focus dialog; if you have content with autofocus attribute, it will directly focus it
methods.description_zh: 焦点对话框;如果你有带有 autofocus 属性的内容，它会直接聚焦它

events.name: shake
events.description: Emitted when the Dialog shakes in order to catch user's attention, unless the 'no-shake' property is set
events.description_zh: 在 Dialog 摇动时发出以引起用户的注意，除非设置了 'no-shake' 属性

events.name: escape-key
events.description: Emitted when ESC key is pressed; Does not get emitted if Dialog is 'persistent' or it has 'no-esc-key' set
events.description_zh: 按下 ESC 键时发出;如果 Dialog 是 'persistent' 或 'no-esc-key' 设置的，则不会发出

events.name: update:model-value
events.description: Emitted when showing/hidden state changes; Is also used by v-model
events.description_zh: 在显示/隐藏状态更改时触发;也被 v-model 使用

persistent.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog if clicking outside of it or hitting ESC key; Also, an app route change won't dismiss it
persistent.description_zh: 如果单击对话框外部或按 ESC 键，用户无法关闭对话框;此外，应用程序路线更改不会关闭它

no-esc-dismiss.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog by hitting ESC key; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set
no-esc-dismiss.description_zh: 用户无法通过按 ESC 键来关闭 Dialog;如果还设置了 'persistent' prop，则无需设置它

no-backdrop-dismiss.description: User cannot dismiss Dialog by clicking outside of it; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set
no-backdrop-dismiss.description_zh: 用户无法通过在 Dialog 外部单击来关闭 Dialog;如果还设置了 'persistent' prop，则无需设置它

no-route-dismiss.description: Changing route app won't dismiss Dialog; No need to set it if 'persistent' prop is also set
no-route-dismiss.description_zh: 更改路线应用程序不会关闭 Dialog;如果还设置了 'persistent' prop，则无需设置它

auto-close.description: Any click/tap inside of the dialog will close it
auto-close.description_zh: 对话框内的任何单击/点击都会将其关闭

seamless.description: Put Dialog into seamless mode; Does not use a backdrop so user is able to interact with the rest of the page too
seamless.description_zh: 将 Dialog 置于无缝模式;不使用背景，因此用户也能够与页面的其余部分进行交互

backdrop-filter.description: Apply a backdrop filter; The value needs to be the same as in the CSS specs for backdrop-filter; The examples are not an exhaustive list
backdrop-filter.description_zh: 应用背景滤镜;该值需要与 backdrop-filter 的 CSS 规范中的值相同;这些示例并非详尽无遗

maximized.description_zh: 将 Dialog 置于最大化模式

full-width.description: Dialog will try to render with same width as the window
full-width.description_zh: 对话框将尝试以与窗口相同的宽度进行渲染

full-height.description: Dialog will try to render with same height as the window
full-height.description_zh: 对话框将尝试以与窗口相同的高度进行渲染

position.description: Stick dialog to one of the sides (top, right, bottom or left)
position.description_zh: 将对话框固定到其中一侧（上、右、下或左）

square.description: Forces content to have squared borders
square.description_zh: 强制内容具有方形边框

no-refocus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets hidden, do not refocus on the DOM element that previously had focus
no-refocus.description_zh: （辅助功能）当 Dialog 被隐藏时，不要重新聚焦在以前具有焦点的 DOM 元素上

no-focus.description: (Accessibility) When Dialog gets shown, do not switch focus on it
no-focus.description_zh: （辅助功能）当 Dialog （对话框） 显示时，不要将焦点切换到它上面

no-shake.description: Do not shake up the Dialog to catch user's attention
no-shake.description_zh: 不要摇晃对话框以吸引用户的注意力

allow-focus-outside.description: Allow elements outside of the Dialog to be focusable; By default, for accessibility reasons, QDialog does not allow outer focus
allow-focus-outside.description_zh: 允许 Dialog 外部的元素可聚焦;默认情况下，出于可访问性的原因，QDialog 不允许外部聚焦

v-model.description: Model of the component defining shown/hidden state; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:model-value' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义显示/隐藏状态的组件模型;使用此属性（以及 'update：model-value' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令

transition-duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位，不含单位）
